data.text:
If you need to change a name or e-mail address that is listed here, please e-mail Mr. Ron Edwards at wolfcoach1@yahoo.com with your changes. And remember,"You're always a Wolf at heart!" (Attended only = they attended PHHS but did not graduate as part of the class.) If your e-mail address appears in GREEN on the site it means the mail we sent you has been returned and you need to recheck the address. If it is incorrect contact wolfcoach1@yahoo.com. If your address appears in RED, it means we are still waiting to send the e-mail concerning the homecoming out to you.
